events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported problem matches refund criteria due to incorrect product delivery.
Assigning case to refunds specialist to handle customer's request promptly.
Hello, I am here to help you with the refund process for your recent order discrepancy.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received?
Here is my order number 4587239 and attached are pictures showing the wrong items sent to me.
We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money back on your card within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and refund confirmation, I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund has been successfully initiated and the case will now be closed.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been closed following successful refund processing and customer confirmation.
